This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
options(stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
CellChatDB <- CellChatDB.mouse # set CellChatDB <- CellChatDB.human if working on the human dataset
interaction_input <- CellChatDB$interaction
complex_input <- CellChatDB$complex
cofactor_input <- CellChatDB$cofactor
geneInfo <- CellChatDB$geneInfo
write.csv(interaction_input, file = "./update_cellchat/interaction_input_CellChatDB.csv")
write.csv(complex_input, file = "./update_cellchat/complex_input_CellChatDB.csv")
write.csv(cofactor_input, file = "./update_cellchat/cofactor_input_CellChatDB.csv")
write.csv(geneInfo, file = "./update_cellchat/geneInfo_input_CellChatDB.csv")
```

```{r}
interaction_input <- read.csv(file = './update_cellchat/interaction_input_CellChatDB.csv', row.names = 1)
complex_input <- read.csv(file = './update_cellchat/complex_input_CellChatDB.csv', row.names = 1)
cofactor_input <- read.csv(file = './update_cellchat/cofactor_input_CellChatDB.csv', row.names = 1)
geneInfo <- read.csv(file = './update_cellchat/geneInfo_input_CellChatDB.csv', row.names = 1)
CellChatDB <- list()
CellChatDB$interaction <- interaction_input
CellChatDB$complex <- complex_input
CellChatDB$cofactor <- cofactor_input
CellChatDB$geneInfo <- geneInfo

saveRDS(CellChatDB,"fly_cellchatDB.rds")

# debug
cellchatobj <- readRDS("cellchatobj.rds")
cellchatDB<- cellchatobj@DB
saveRDS(cellchatDB,"fly_cellchatDB.rds" )
```

Add a new chunk by clicking the *Insert Chunk* button on the toolbar or by pressing *Ctrl+Alt+I*.

When you save the notebook, an HTML file containing the code and output will be saved alongside it (click the *Preview* button or press *Ctrl+Shift+K* to preview the HTML file).

The preview shows you a rendered HTML copy of the contents of the editor. Consequently, unlike *Knit*, *Preview* does not run any R code chunks. Instead, the output of the chunk when it was last run in the editor is displayed.
